title: Very Comfortable & Attractive Large Single Room
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


A very comfortable and attractive large single room is available now - for one person only. 

Located in Kilburn, North London (Maida Vale end).  

The room is clean, fully furnished, and with own cooking facilities.  

Use of washing machine.

Zone 2, and only 2 minutes from the London Underground.  Opposite a British Rail station.  Near shopping centre and a short trip to the West End.  

Price is inclusive of everything (Wireless Broadband Internet, Council Tax, electricity, gas and water).  

NO BILLS TO PAY.

CONTACT INFORMATION:

Text/call with your name and some details about yourself to arrange a viewing:

07586820050

NON-SMOKERS ONLY PLEASE.
